content: XOOB is gaining traction, having reached top 5 mini-apps on Telegram within just 7 days. They've closed a seed investment round, offering a 10% discount for 48 hours, significantly increasing their cash reserves. Offline mining is now available, making it convenient to mine without needing to keep the farm online. To get involved, simply join the bot, purchase a ship for mining, complete tasks, farm milk, spin, and invite friends. With two rounds already closed, the deadline is near, but a roadmap is expected soon.
